title: Stephanie Davis finally heals rift with with baby dad Jeremy McConnell as she follows him back on Twitter and Instagram following DNA results
text:
TV Magazine INSTA-OFFICIAL Stephanie Davis finally heals rift with with baby dad Jeremy McConnell as she follows him back on Twitter and Instagram following DNA results 
The actress has re-connected with her ex, dad to their son Caben-Albi, on her social media accounts By BETH ALLCOCK, Showbiz Reporter 13th February 2017, 12:38 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments STEPHANIE Davis has taken the first step in making amends with ex and dad to her child Jeremy McConnell by following him on Twitter and Instagram. 
The former Hollyoaks star deleted all traces of the Irish hunk – who this weekend confirmed he is the father of their son Caben-Albi – from her social media pages after their explosive split last year. Getty Images 6 Steph is now following Jez on Twitter and Instagram 
Yet she has now re-followed his Twitter profile after he proudly told the world he would “step up” and play a parental role in his little boy’s life. 
He has reciprocated, and also chosen to follow Steph’s account both on Twitter and Instagram. The pair are parents to adorable tot Caben-Albi, born last month Rex Features 6 They found love on Celebrity Big Brother 
Steph and Jez found love during their time in Celebrity Big Brother yet after a rollercoaster relationship and accusations of violence decide to part ways. 
The actress then discovered she was pregnant and always claimed Jez – who took a paternity test on ITV show This Morning – was the dad. 
Insisting he hoped he is the father to little Caben , Jeremy said: “It’s time to put our differences aside and do the right thing. It’s plain and simple. 
“This could be dealt with privately from the start but we can’t change the past.” 
After finding out the results, Dubliner Jez took to his own Twitter page this weekend. 
The former Celebrity Big Brother star shared a sweet close-up photo of the tiny tot on his Twitter profile on Saturday, writing: “I’ll love this monkey with every bit of me.” JezzaMcConnell/Twitter This weekend Jez confirmed he is the baby’s father Fame Flynet He has vowed to ‘step up’ and be a dad Jeremy McConnell takes a paternity test on This Morning 
After his revelation, Jeremy’s fans inundated him on social media with many congratulating him on his “mini-me” son.

Yet according to The Mirror , the photo was taken from one of Stephanie’s private social media accounts, and Jeremy is yet to come face to face with his son. 
The site claims Jeremy hasn’t made plans to meet his baby “in the near future”, but the former couple are currently working to sort out an arrangement. 
It comes after Jeremy confirmed he’s the father of Steph’s baby with the social media posts, days after appearing on This Morning to plead with her for the DNA results. Jeremy McConnell talks to Bizarre’s Dan Wootton about ex Stephanie Davis and baby claims 
Shortly after the segment, ex-Hollyoaks star Steph posted a lengthy response , which has since been deleted, reading: “ Stephanie has felt humiliated by Jeremy denying his own son and foolishly announcing publicly his request for a DNA test. 
“ Jeremy has caused Stephanie massive amount of stress, pressure and upset throughout her pregnancy, ruining what for most women is one of the most special times of their lives.”
